extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    FREN220 or FREN221.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from FREN215; FREN353; FREN393.

basic.description: Introduction to basic notions in phonetics and phonology. Physiology of speech and phonation, description and classification of French sounds, distinction between phonetics and phonology, description of the French phonological system (phonemes and feature system, phonological rules and syllable structure).
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Phonétique et phonologie du français
